content: this purse design is a pretty and quick pattern to make use the pattern to make stock for your markets or gifts for family and friends this pattern has been tested for accuracy but please contact me at craftsbysarahliz@gmail com if you encounter any issues materials h hook 5mm worsted weight cotton yarn tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work permissions you are free to sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog ravelry or etsy shop to credit me as the designer you may not use my photos you may not sell this pattern or any part of this pattern distribute it or claim it as your own © 2024 sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz
